post.description:
Register new tenant with all 6 steps:
1. Choose accounting type (LOCKED FOREVER)
2. Company info
3. Admin user
4. Preferences
5. Plan selection
6. Complete registration

Login with email and password
Returns access token, refresh token, user info, and tenant info

Refresh access token using refresh token
Expects refresh token in Authorization header

get.description: Get current user information

post.description:
Logout endpoint
Note: With JWT, actual logout is handled on the client side by removing the token
This endpoint is here for consistency and can be used for logging/analytics

put.description: Update current user's profile (name and email)

Update tenant settings (company name, currency, and date format)
Only admin users can update tenant settings

get.description:
List all users in the current tenant.
Only accessible by admin users.

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users  Get

post.description:
Create a new user in the current tenant.
Only accessible by admin users.

get.description:
Get a specific user by ID.
Users can view their own profile, admins can view any user in their tenant.

put.description:
Update a user's information (role, name, email).
Only accessible by admin users.

delete.description:
Deactivate a user (soft delete).
Only accessible by admin users.

put.description:
Reactivate a deactivated user.
Only accessible by admin users.

get.description: List all money accounts for current tenant

schema.title: Response List Accounts Api V1 Accounts  Get

get.description: Get a specific money account by ID

List all categories for current tenant
Optionally filter by transaction_type (INCOME or EXPENSE)

schema.title: Response List Categories Api V1 Categories  Get

get.description: Get a specific category by ID

List transactions with optional filters:
- transaction_type: INCOME or EXPENSE
- account_id: Filter by money account
- category_id: Filter by category
- start_date: Filter from this date
- end_date: Filter until this date

schema.title: Response List Transactions Api V1 Transactions  Get

post.description: Create a new transaction and update account balance

get.description: Get dashboard statistics for current tenant
Get a specific transaction by ID

put.description: Update an existing transaction and adjust account balances

delete.description: Delete a transaction and reverse account balance

get.description: Get all partners for the current tenant

schema.title: Response List Partners Api V1 Partners  Get

get.description: Get a specific partner by ID
List all tax rates for current tenant

schema.title: Response List Tax Rates Api V1 Tax Rates  Get

get.description: Get a specific tax rate by ID
Export accounts to CSV
Export categories to CSV
Export transactions to CSV
Export complete data backup as JSON

List all financial years for the current tenant
Ordered by start_date descending (most recent first)

schema.title: Response List Financial Years Api V1 Fiscal Years  Get

post.description:
Create a new financial year (Admin only)

Validates:
- No overlapping dates with existing years
- end_date is after start_date
- Only one year can be marked as current

get.description: Get the current active financial year
Get a specific financial year with statistics

delete.description:
Delete a financial year (Admin only)

Cannot delete if:
- Year has transactions
- Year is closed

put.description: Set a financial year as the current active year (Admin only)

post.description:
Validate if a financial year can be closed (Admin only)

Returns validation results with warnings and errors

Close a financial year (Admin only)

Steps:
1. Validates all transactions have categories (if validate_categories=True)
2. Runs cascade recalculation to ensure balances are correct
3. Marks all balances as final
4. Updates year status to CLOSED
5. Creates audit trail with balance snapshot
6. Optionally creates next year with opening balances

Manually trigger cascade recalculation from this year onwards (Admin only)

This is useful after:
- Editing transactions in a closed year
- Fixing data inconsistencies
- Migrating historical data

get.description:
Get all account balance snapshots for a specific financial year

Returns opening, closing balances and transaction summaries for each account

schema.title: Response Get Year Balances Api V1 Fiscal Years  Year Id  Balances Get

get.description:
Generate Cash Flow Statement for a financial year

Shows:
- Opening cash balance
- Cash inflows by category
- Cash outflows by category
- Net cash flow
- Closing cash balance
- Account-wise breakdown

Generate Trial Balance for a financial year

In single-entry accounting, this shows:
- Accounts with positive balances (debit)
- Accounts with negative balances (credit)
- Total debit = Total credit for validation

Generate Income Statement (Profit & Loss) for a financial year

Shows:
- Income by category
- Expenses by category
- Total income, total expenses
- Net profit/loss
- Profit margin percentage

Generate Balance Sheet for a financial year

In single-entry accounting:
- Assets: Sum of all account closing balances
- Equity: Opening balance + net profit/loss
- Retained Earnings: Cumulative from previous years
